title: The meanes and method of healing in the Church. Set forth in a sermon. Preached before the Right Honourable the House of Peers in Westminster Abby, April 30. 1660. being a day of solemn humiliation to seek God for his blessing on the counsels of the Parliament. By Edward Reynolds, D.D. and Dean of Christ-Church.
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: printed by Tho. Ratcliffe, for George Thomason at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,
